mapper.select: SELECT s.*, r.review_idx, r.seekgu_idx, r.review_rate, r.member_nickname, r.review_comment, m.member_nickname as writer FROM seekguboard s LEFT JOIN review r ON s.seekgu_idx = r.seekgu_idx LEFT JOIN member m ON s.member_idx = m.member_idx WHERE s.seekgu_idx = #{seekguIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seekguboard (seekgu_idx, seekgu_title, seekgu_content, seekgu_restaurant_name, seekgu_restaurant_latitude, seekgu_restaurant_longitude, seekgu_min, seekgu_max, seekgu_limit_time, seekgu_reg_date, seekgu_meal_time, member_idx) values (0, #{seekguTitle}, #{seekguContent}, #{seekguRestaurantName}, #{seekguRestaurantLatitude}, #{seekguRestaurantLongitude}, #{seekguMin}, #{seekguMax}, #{seekguLimitTime}, NOW(), #{seekguMealTime}, #{memberIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT * from seekguboard WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, seekgu_reg_date, NOW()) < seekgu_limit_time AND seekgu_member_count < seekgu_max
SELECT * from seekguboard WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, seekgu_reg_date, NOW()) >= seekgu_limit_time OR seekgu_member_count = seekgu_max
SELECT * FROM seekguboard WHERE seekgu_idx = #{seekguIdx} FOR UPDATE
